RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset password
RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter the email address you use to send you password reset instructions.
Enter the email address you use to log in to ExiZap to get the password reset instructions.
RESET_PASSWORD.GO_BACK_TO_LOGIN: If you want to go back to the login page,

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Password reset link has been sent to your email.
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to ExiZap server. Please try again.
